Package mil.nga.geopackage.user

Class UserColumns<TColumn extends UserColumn>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.geopackage.user.UserColumns<TColumn>
  • Type Parameters:
    TColumn - column type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributesColumns, FeatureColumns, TileColumns, UserCustomColumns
    public abstract class UserColumns<TColumn extends UserColumn>
extends Object
    Abstract collection of columns from a user table, representing a full set of table columns or a subset from a query
    Since:
    3.5.0
    Author:
    osbornb
